Also connect with us on
Describe in detail what your business or product is. What does it do? Provide as much detail as possible.
Where is the company situated?
Have you ever raised funding from outside? if yes, please provide all the details (when, how much and at what valuation).\nAnd how much have you raised in total ?
How much money have you invested in the company and in what time frame? What was that money used for?
What investment amount are you seeking, and what percentage of equity are you willing to give in exchange?\n(“I\'m seeking $_______ and I\'m willing to give up ______%”)
What do you intend to do with the investment funds? Where will the money go?
Please enlist all the founding members name with the equity distribution among them and founder title (e.g. CEO) .
How long have each of you been working on this?
Why did you pick this idea to work on? Do you have domain expertise in this area? How do you know people need what you\'re making?
How do or will you make money?
How far along are you? Any MVP or Market validation you have done so far, elaborate.
How long have each of you been working on this? How much of that has been full-time? Please explain.
What are your business’s total lifetime sales since starting?
What was the Gross income from your income last year?
What was Net income from your business last year
What are your sales projections for next calender year
How do or will you make money? How much could you make?
